definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: Why would we get mad when we are with people who are unreasonable?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們會在與橫蠻的人相處時生氣呢？

sentences.english: She said you were domineering and rude.
You are upset by hostile people only because they awaken your own hostility.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們會在與橫蠻的人相處時生氣呢？

sentences.english: He was as nervous as a witch and as cross as a bear .
sentences.chinese: 他象巫婆一樣神經過敏，像熊一樣橫蠻兇狠。

sentences.english: Time changed, the strategy of being bestial a century ago is not easily applicable nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 一百年前行得通的橫蠻現在不容易，時空都不同了。

sentences.english: Pupils should never cheek their teachers.
sentences.chinese: 學生們絕不應對老師橫蠻無禮。

sentences.english: His peremptory character makes people around him feel disgusted.
sentences.chinese: 他橫蠻的性格，讓周圍的人感到厭惡。
